entry.title: Fall Handloom Madras Shirt by Gant Rugger
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gant Rugger
Type: Shirts
Price: 94.00

Gant's Fall Handloom Madras Shirt, in 100% cotton with a slightly more relaxed fit, features an allover checked pattern, button-down collar, front chest pocket and familiar locker loop.

entry.title: Birch Boiled Wool Blazer by Grayers
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grayers
Type: Outerwear
Price: 137.00

Grayers hybrid interpretation of a lapel blazer, featuring a rounded turned-down collar and shaped into a "blazer", is crafted with boiled wool, a technique that results in a densely finished knitted fabric. Unlike a sweater, it is then cut and sewn into a jacket. 50% Wool 50% Polyester. IMPORTED.

entry.title: Herringbone Wool Tie by Grayers
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grayers
Type: Accessories
Price: 60.00

This herringbone tie is made from a slub wool with a slight tweed look in a versatile charcoal color to dress up cold weather looks. 50% Wool 50% Polyester. IMPORTED.

entry.title: Heritage Flannel Shirt by Grayers
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grayers
Type: Shirts
Price: 76.00

Weighing in at 8.7 ounces, the Heritage Flannel comes in the softest heather yarn-dyed brushed flannel. In a vintage inspired red and gray plaid, the Heritage is complete with a placket trimmed in herringbone cotton. 100% Cotton. IMPORTED.

entry.title: Heritage Flannel Shirt by Grayers
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grayers
Type: Shirts
Price: 76.00

This rendition is a classic vintage-inspired multi color plaid in a compact and soft brushed cotton flannel. Complete with a placket trimmed in a herringbone cotton. 100% Cotton. IMPORTED.

entry.title: Ivy Blazer by Grayers
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grayers
Type: Outerwear
Price: 156.00

Special details include a half-lined body in poplin, and sleeves lined with bemberg lining. This versatile jacket can be worn with a dress shirt and pants, or more casual with our Selvedge Chambray Shirt and Japanese Selvedge Denim. 75% Wool, 25% Nylon. Imported.

entry.title: Alpes Parka by A.P.C.
entry.summary:
Vendor: A.P.C.
Type: Outerwear
Price: 577.00

Water repellent Italian cotton gabardine. Straight cut. High buttoned collar with large hood. Two-way zip closure under buttoned flap. Piped raglan button-flap pockets. On-seam side pockets. Pleat and slit at wrist. Sewn-on cuff adjusts with buttoned tab. Piped inside pocket. Removable button-on lining in faux sheepskin. Quilted sleeve lining. Edges and seams of removable lining trimmed in white bias binding. Napped lining. 100% Cotton. Professional cleaning only.

entry.title: The Shetland Sweater by Gant Rugger
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gant Rugger
Type: Tops
Price: 93.00

The Gant Rugger Shetland Sweater, made from the finest sheep’s wool with saddle shoulders, is as warm as it is airy.

entry.title: The Basketweave Sweater by Gant Rugger
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gant Rugger
Type: Tops
Price: 110.00

The Basketweave Sweater, in a 7-gauge cotton-wool-Alpaca blend that’s been expertly knitted in a pattern to resemble detailed basketwork, features a slightly wider crewneck and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

entry.title: Emile Shirt by A.P.C.
entry.summary:
Vendor: A.P.C.
Type: Shirts
Price: 147.00

Italian indigo cotton Oxford cloth. Buttoned placket closure. Seven buttons. Topstitched breast pocket. Back yoke, box pleat below. Pleat and reinforced slit at wrist. Buttoned cuff. Felled seams. Slightly rounded hem. Mother-of-pearl buttons. 100% Cotton. Machine wash. Do not tumble dry.

entry.title: Steven Overshirt by A.P.C.
entry.summary:
Vendor: A.P.C.
Type: Shirts
Price: 165.00

Plaid Italian wool blend flannel. Buttoned placket closure. Six buttons. Button-down collar with topstitched edges. Back yoke. Pleat and buttoned slit at wrist. Topstitched, buttoned cuffs. Felled seams. Slightly rounded hem. 75% Wool. 25% Nylon. Professional cleaning only.

entry.title: Steven Overshirt by A.P.C.

entry.title: Lewis Long Coat by A.P.C.
entry.summary:
Vendor: A.P.C.
Type: Outerwear
Price: 516.00

Italian double face wool blend. Tailored collar. Undercollar in thin felt. Front buttoning. Three buttons. Piped flap pockets. Single vent. Piped inside pocket. Partial lining. Bias trim inside. Buttons in horn and powdered horn. Napped lining. Mid-thigh length. 80% Wool. 20% Polyamide. Professional cleaning only.
